section.title: Overview
section.p: The Webapp Eclipse plug-in is intended for war packaging of a web application. It can only be used by another plug-in, i.e. it does not provide any action to users for the moment.

ul.li: Provides a project property page for web application setup.
Generates a war file containg the libraries (Jar files) and the web files selected in the property page.

section.title: Requirements
section.p: The webapp plugin requires a version of the Eclipse platform later than 2.1 RC2.

section.title: Installation
section.p: Uncompress the zip file and copy the 'org.apache.cactus.integration.eclipse_[version]' folder to your Eclipse 'plugins' folder and restart Eclipse.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: Select a Java project, right click and open its properties. On the page that appears select the Web Application item.

section.title: Using
section.p: This plug-in can only be called by another plug-in. See the Cactus runner plug-in for a use case.
